game_description: This an easy way to experience FPV drone-flights in virtual reality with Meta Quest. Flying FPV is not easy and especially for beginners very challenging. It's save to start in a simulator, before crashing hundreds of dollars of equipment in to the ground. Fly drones with or without FPV-Goggles in "Yue's VR-FPV-Sim". Start with the guided tutorial and learn all about the gameplay and how to control drones in "acro-mode"! Total of 9 Maps • "Industrial" 1, 2 & 3 • "Secret Testtrack" with a driving car • "Skilift" with a moving seatlift • "Hangar" with a private-jet inside • "Super Market" • "Parking Garage" • "Mountain" Simulation Properties • Rigidbody Physics, parameters configurable • PID regulated simulation, parameters configurable • Hovereffect Gameplay Properties • Compatible with a gamepad • Seated or roomscale • Acrade Mode mini-game
review_1: Great game, but I wish there were several types of drones with preset physics settings (light drone, heavy drone, racing drone). I miss the ability to record results on the Industrial tracks. Racing against a ghost in the Industrial tracks would be great as well. Also, I would have liked to see a trick training area on the map - a vertical pipe.
review_2: As an AppLab app - it just works and can give you some impression. By default it uses AcroMode, which is hard for me - as it is only for roll and pitch... So always switched to CalibMode, when roll and pitch do not require opposite move to return back to neutral position. Regarding @J3ffr3y comment - from time to time, settings are broken, and a drone does not react to any command including start up. Reason - both AcroMode and CalibMode checkboxes were unchecked because of some bug with settings, so just activate one of them to make it working again.
review_3: I’d love if you could add the option to create custom stick layouts? I don’t use the standard layout on this sim so learning fpv is even harder! - would love to know if this could be an option in the future? Otherwise really impressed - it’s a great tool!
review_4: This app doesn’t work properly and it can’t be refunded. What a scam.
